vsParam:
Now all the monsters are quiet
without the dragon being around.

Everything is back to normal,
back to the time when the dragon wasn't here...

Back to normal, what are you talking about!?
I think you missed something!
Oh, right... Mimi and Sterk need to go back to their world.

You came here accidentally because of a space-time distortion
caused by the dragon. I almost forgot that...

Yeah... Now that the threat from the dragon has been eliminated,
we need to go back.
You know how to get back?

Um... We're still working on it.
It's not going well even with Ru Sensei's help...

I think the space-time distortion that sent you here
has disappeared way back...
Now it's our turn to help you two!

No way! Even though... it's good to live here...
No, no means no!
Haha! So you do like our world.

But you must want to go back to your world.
Let's help you this time!

Yeah, after all, you helped us a lot!
Now, it's our turn to help you!

Anyway, we can't go back right away.
Forget it.

Wherever I am, my only job is to
try my best to burnish the reputation of my family.

And I'll be a competent knight in this world too.
You can always come to me if you need anything.

Th-thanks! Sterk, you yourself must have trouble
in adapting to the life in this different world...

No need to worry about me.
Destiny brought us here.

Plus, I got to slay a dragon here.
That was epic.

Exactly! Slayed a dragon... Yeah~
We did a great thing!

Oh, I know Cresson would think so, but Sterk...
This adventure is what you crave too?

Haha, we're so assured with you two here!
Let's keep working together, Sterk, Mimi!

Yeah. Just let me know if you run into
any powerful monsters. I'll take care of them!

It's nice to work with you too.
I'll be here and witness how you make progress.
